extendedInfo.description: Ever wondered how medical professionals handle patients during an epidemic? Now you can experience the adrenaline rush with Pixel Hospital, the retro game that puts you in charge of an E.R.!Pixel Hospital is the highly pixelated time management game for those who canât get enough of deadly outbreaks and blocky graphics! With cute characters and retro style 8-bit graphics, this is a medical adventure you wonât forget!The story so farA pandemic has swept the city, and Pixel Hospital is teeming with patients. You are the head doctor in this wacky and fun-filled game. Using hospital staff, resources and equipment, you must coordinate the emergency response efforts and beat the outbreak.As you frantically nurse patients back to health, keep an eye out for VIPs â the disease doesnât discriminate, but Pixel Hospital certainly does, and youâd better make sure that VIPs receive the highest level of care!Grab your doctorâs coat and cure all patients before the city's population is wiped out!

reviews.title: @Valerie (7/12/2013)
reviews.comment: Im having the same trouble, I purchased some medi points for 99 cents twice today and I do not see the increase at all, I emailed the developer.
reviews.author: shamika davis

reviews.title: Help! Coins not being credited.
reviews.comment: I love this game and Tapjoy says it has given me the coins but the balance on my account isn\'t increasing. Please fix and I will re-rate.
reviews.author: Valerie Cruz

reviews.title: Horrable!!!!!
reviews.comment: DO NOT DOWNLOUD THIS I REPEAT IT!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOUD THIS THIS IS HORRABLE EVEN I DOWNLOUD IT, IT ALWAYS SHUT DOWN YOU GOTTA FIX THIS THING UNFORTUNALLY IT ALWAYS ALWAYS BRAKES MY TAB AND I  BOUGHT A NEW ONE ALREADY ITSNEXPENSIVE THE TAB 1000,234 O.O PLS DONT DOWNLOUD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So Cute!
reviews.comment: I love this game, it\'s so simple but so cute! I wish it had a story mode, though, and it\'s too bad that past a certain point you need Medipoints to do anything. (But I guess you guys have to make money somehow! Plus the free  daily bonus is just very nice.) I hope to see more games like this from you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boring and cash crazy
reviews.comment: Its not hospital sim even its wants to look like. A lot of things in the game had to be bought for real cash and the game is also and heavy. Gameplay is just boring clicking on the patients and chairs. Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: Arkadiusz Wielga

reviews.title: Fun but buggy
reviews.comment: This end is good, addictive fun. Would rate it higher but it freezes every ten minutes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: its a good game! i gave it 4 stars because its so hard to earn alooot of money... :) nice anyways :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Daily bonuses!
reviews.comment: This game is really addictive. I love it very much! But the only problem is that I haven\'t been getting any daily bonuses lately. Is that only there for a few days or was it suppose to be continuous? If it\'s the latter, please fix this. Thank you. :)
reviews.author: Katharine Camomot

reviews.comment: Really cute games but please make more different types of patients. Also for the free medi points you guys give away way too little, give us more!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Level 12
reviews.comment: Game freezes every time you go to level twelve
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Daily points need to get fixed
reviews.comment: The timer for the daily medi points or coins needs to get fixed. I would play it on and off all day and wouldn\'t receive my 10 points. Which you really need these points to progress in the game. Other then the alternate currency needed in game it\'s great. Very addicting.
reviews.author: alexandrie kitty

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Super addictive and fun! It\'s also very cute. The gameplay is swell, however it is a bit sad that most helpers cost coins.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hopsital
reviews.comment: I like the gam but I don\'t lik the way i have to pay so much for medi points. Good gam XD!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kinks
reviews.comment: I have never gotten any free daily bonuses or whatever and I\'ve been playing this game for a while and it lags when I try to drag the people to were they need to go, and if it weren\'t for your free coins opportunities then I would have quit along time ago. Everything is kinda pricey moreso for those who won\'t spen money on the coins. Its an alrite game to pass time with but the farther you advance the more annoying and intrusive the \'kinks\' become. Please fix them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looove this!
reviews.comment: Well this is so darn cute I think I had a stroke. Really simple (but addictive) gameplay mixed with fun retro style graphics and catchy music.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 1st few days, had coin bonus then nothing. No way to progess past a certain point without coins. Game becomes too laggy to play when lots of patients
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: cool, nice, no problems works perfectly and well fun and addictive I almost played until my phone died , download wont dissapoint u
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but gets old
reviews.comment: Fun game very repetitive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Gets  unresponsive starting at lvl 15. Samsung Epic 4G
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Crashes but when it works its an ok game.
reviews.author: Katie Wescott
